verses.verse: וּזְכֹר֙ <WH2142> Remember אֶת־ <WH853> בּ֣וֹרְאֶ֔יךָ <WH1254> now thy Creator בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> in the days בְּחוּרֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH979> of thy youth עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> when לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> come יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> days הָֽרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> while the evil וְהִגִּ֣יעוּ <WH5060> draw nigh שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> not nor the years אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> when תֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> when thou shalt say אֵֽין־ <WH369> have לִ֥י בָהֶ֖ם חֵֽפֶץ׃ <WH2656> I have no pleasure

עַ֠ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תֶחְשַׁ֤ךְ <WH2821> be not darkened הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> While the sun וְהָא֔וֹר <WH216> or the light וְהַיָּרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> or the moon וְהַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים <WH3556> or the stars וְשָׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> return הֶעָבִ֖ים <WH5645> nor the clouds אַחַ֥ר <WH310> after הַגָּֽשֶׁם׃ <WH1653> the rain

בַּיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> In the day שֶׁיָּזֻ֙עוּ֙ <WH2111> shall tremble שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> when the keepers הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> of the house וְהִֽתְעַוְּת֖וּ <WH5791> shall bow אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> men הֶחָ֑יִל <WH2428> and the strong וּבָטְל֤וּ <WH988> cease הַטֹּֽחֲנוֹת֙ <WH2912> themselves and the grinders כִּ֣י <WH3588> because מִעֵ֔טוּ <WH4592> almost some וְחָשְׁכ֥וּ <WH2821> be darkened הָרֹא֖וֹת <WH7200> and those that look out בָּאֲרֻבּֽוֹת׃ <WH699> of the windows

וְסֻגְּר֤וּ <WH5462> shall be shut דְלָתַ֙יִם֙ <WH1817> And the doors בַּשּׁ֔וּק <WH7784> in the streets בִּשְׁפַ֖ל <WH8217> is low ק֣וֹל <WH6963> when the sound הַֽטַּחֲנָ֑ה <WH2913> of the grinding וְיָקוּם֙ <WH6965> and he shall rise up לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> at the voice הַצִּפּ֔וֹר <WH6833> of the bird וְיִשַּׁ֖חוּ <WH7817> shall be brought low כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> and all the daughters הַשִּֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> of musick

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Furthermore מִגָּבֹ֤הַּ <WH1364> of [that which is] high יִרָ֙אוּ֙ <WH3372> Also [when] they shall be afraid וְחַתְחַתִּ֣ים <WH2849> and fears בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> [shall be] in the way וְיָנֵ֤אץ <WH5006> shall flourish הַשָּׁקֵד֙ <WH8247> and the almond tree וְיִסְתַּבֵּ֣ל <WH5445> shall be a burden הֶֽחָגָ֔ב <WH2284> and the grasshopper וְתָפֵ֖ר <WH6565> shall fail הָֽאֲבִיּוֹנָ֑ה <WH35> and desire כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֹלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> goeth הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> because man אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> home עוֹלָמ֔וֹ <WH5769> to his long וְסָבְב֥וּ <WH5437> go about בַשּׁ֖וּק <WH7784> the streets הַסֹּפְדִֽים׃ <WH5594> and the mourners

עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Or לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Or ever [יִרחַק כ] (יֵרָתֵק֙ <WH7368> remove ק) חֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> cord הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> the silver וְתָרֻ֖ץ <WH7533> be broken גֻּלַּ֣ת <WH1543> bowl הַזָּהָ֑ב <WH2091> or the golden וְתִשָּׁ֤בֶר <WH7665> be broken כַּד֙ <WH3537> or the pitcher עַל־ <WH5921> by הַמַּבּ֔וּעַ <WH4002> at the fountain וְנָרֹ֥ץ <WH7533> broken הַגַּלְגַּ֖ל <WH1534> or the wheel אֶל־ <WH413> at הַבּֽוֹר׃ <WH953> at the cistern

וְיָשֹׁ֧ב <WH7725> return הֶעָפָ֛ר <WH6083> Then shall the dust עַל־ <WH5921> unto הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> to the earth כְּשֶׁהָיָ֑ה <WH1961> it was וְהָר֣וּחַ <WH7307> as it was and the spirit תָּשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> shall return אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> unto God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נְתָנָֽהּ׃ <WH5414> who gave
הֲבֵ֧ל <WH1892> Vanity הֲבָלִ֛ים <WH1892> of vanities אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith הַקּוֹהֶ֖לֶת <WH6953> the preacher הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> all [is] vanity

וְיֹתֵ֕ר <WH3148> And moreover שֶׁהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> to being קֹהֶ֖לֶת <WH6953> because the preacher חָכָ֑ם <WH2450> was wise ע֗וֹד <WH5750> also לִמַּד־ <WH3925> he still taught דַּ֙עַת֙ <WH1847> knowledge אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וְאִזֵּ֣ן <WH238> give וְחִקֵּ֔ר <WH2713> and sought out תִּקֵּ֖ן <WH8626> [and] set in order מְשָׁלִ֥ים <WH4912> proverbs הַרְבֵּֽה׃ <WH7235> many

בִּקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> sought קֹהֶ֔לֶת <WH6953> The preacher לִמְצֹ֖א <WH4672> to find out דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> words חֵ֑פֶץ <WH2656> acceptable וְכָת֥וּב <WH3789> and [that which was] written יֹ֖שֶׁר <WH3476> [was] upright דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> [even] words אֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> of truth

דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> The words חֲכָמִים֙ <WH2450> of the wise כַּדָּ֣רְבֹנ֔וֹת <WH1861> [are] as goads וּֽכְמַשְׂמְר֥וֹת <WH4930> and as nails נְטוּעִ֖ים <WH5193> fastened בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> [by] the masters אֲסֻפּ֑וֹת <WH627> of assemblies נִתְּנ֖וּ <WH5414> [which] are given מֵרֹעֶ֥ה <WH7462> shepherd אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> from one

וְיֹתֵ֥ר <WH3148> And further מֵהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> by these בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> my son הִזָּהֵ֑ר <WH2094> be admonished עֲשׂ֨וֹת <WH6213> of making סְפָרִ֤ים <WH5612> books הַרְבֵּה֙ <WH7235> many אֵ֣ין <WH369> no קֵ֔ץ <WH7093> [there is] no end וְלַ֥הַג <WH3854> study הַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> and much יְגִעַ֥ת <WH3024> [is] a weariness בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> of the flesh

ס֥וֹף <WH5490> the conclusion דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> of the whole matter הַכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all נִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> Let us hear אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> God יְרָא֙ <WH3372> Fear וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹתָ֣יו <WH4687> his commandments שְׁמ֔וֹר <WH8104> and keep כִּי־ <WH3588> because זֶ֖ה <WH2088> this כָּל־ <WH3605> every הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> for this [is] the whole [duty] of man

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every מַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH4639> every work הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> For God יָבִ֥א <WH935> shall bring בְמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> into judgment עַ֣ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> everything נֶעְלָ֑ם <WH5956> with every secret thing אִם־ <WH518> whether ט֖וֹב <WH2896> whether [it be] good וְאִם־ <WH518> whether רָֽע׃ <WH7451> or whether [it be] evil
